text: Timothy Franz Geithner (pronounced /ˈɡaɪtnər/; born August 18, 1961), was the 75th United States Secretary of the Treasury from 2009 to 2013. He served under President Barack Obama. Before becoming Secretary of the Treasury, he was president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. Geithner was born in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:United States Secretaries of the Treasury Category:Living people Category:American Christians Category:American economists category:Politicians from New York City
title: Timothy Geithner
